mapper.insert:
insert into parent_event
parent_id,
parent_event,
parent_date,
#{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{parentEvent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{parentDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.select: select parent_date TheDate, count(*) as shuLiang from parent_event where parent_event='约课' and parent_date between #{start_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{end_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} group by day(parent_date);
